question: What are some excercises that will tighten muscles in your belly, thighs and upper arms (beneath)?
question_content: What are some excercises that will tighten muscles in your belly, thighs and upper arms (beneath)?

answers.answer_content:
do :
>push-ups for stomach muscle
>squats for thighs
>swing your arms in circle for upper arms
>hold one below elbow arm, hold it still then form a hard fist the loosen it then form a fist again , then loosen it again do the same thing again and again but keep your below elbow arm held still by the other hand ,do not loose that grip- ( for beneath arm exercise)( under elbow arm)
> lastly, most importantly-  you must have drink lots of water! or you'll' be dehydrated!!!you will also need at least 11 hours of sleep everyday!!
Climbing a tree like a monkey

crunches for your belly.....inner thigh press machine for your thighs at a gym with weight....tricep lift with weight for triceps beneath arms...remember none of this will work if you do not eat right!
Bellydancing. I'm doing it since little and I was always in shape.
